20101230075014.000|20101230075015.000|CC1|AGAINST RELIGION, BUT TO THIS   
20101230075015.000|20101230075017.000|CC1|DAY, HE CONTINUES HIS OWN       
20101230075017.000|20101230075018.000|CC1|SPIRITUAL PRACTICE.
